title: Linux uudecode Command with Practical Examples
description: Learn how to use the uudecode command in Linux to decode uuencoded files. Explore practical examples and understand the purpose of this useful tool for backup and compression tasks.

meta.title: Linux uudecode Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Learn how to use the uudecode command in Linux to decode uuencoded files. Explore practical examples and understand the purpose of this useful tool for backup and compression tasks.
meta.keywords: Linux, uudecode, uuencode, file decoding, backup, compression
